5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

port-pointer

Generic function

Summary

Returns the pointer used on the specified port.

Signature

port-pointer port => pointer

Arguments

port
An instance of type <port>.

Values

pointer
An instance of type <pointer>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Returns the pointer used on port.

See also

port-modifier-state, page 331

port-name, page 332

port-server-path, page 333

port-type, page 334

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
